title: Baroque
description: Artemisia was a protector on the land of Lux, but when she sleeps, the world around her changes. Time jumps two-hundred years ahead, and chaos breaks the precious bonds that once held Lux together. The people of the darkness will kill to get what they want, and they want it all.This is the second short story from the anthology, Over My Spilled Blood. This is the inspiration behind the Finite Faerie series and the book The Calling.
author: Joseph Hunt
